page.title: 03BROUGHTY FERRY SPORTS CLUBS
page.content: There are a good number of different clubs in this area serving the demands of the majority of the local people. {WATER SPORTS} Being situated on the Estuary, water sports are naturally popular. The Royal Tay Yacht Club holds several races and competition days throughout the year. Water skiing is often seen on the Tay and Ye Ancient Amphibians hold their annual swim to Tayport and back. {OTHER SPORTS}There are good facilities for tennis, bowling, cricket and football. Forthill Sports Club offers facilities for squash, tennis,cricket and rugby.The recently converted Queen St. Church caters for snooker and pool and provides a gym.Scouts,Boys Brigade Guides,Girls Brigade,Brownies and Cubs flourish in Broughty Ferry.
